ComicInfo.Summary:
Man-Thing - all fear burns at its touch. When a young child is in danger, will Man-Thing exact justice upon the child's evil father?
Starting with this issue, the title was changed to Adventure into Fear.
Man-Thing! - Man-Thing saves the life of a child abandoned in the swamp The Spell of the Sea Witch!! - a tale of murder and mystery, a tale of crime and retribution There is Something Strange About Mister Jones! - Fog blankets the waterfront... and in the mist stands a lone, silent figure! This is his story! The fantastic, spine-chilling story of a man called Jones! (writers and artists of this story were uncredited and are unknown)
